Scroggle 
\ This is a very interesting word game mainly based on old Boggle word game where you form words from the given letter in the grids of one 3X3 large grid and 9 3X3 smaller grids. 
\ Duration and Phases: Total of 3 minutes with two phases. Each phase runs for 1.5 minutes. At the end of each phase, the game will automatically take you to the next phase. 
\ Operations: One short click on one letter if you want to pick that letter, and long click on one letter if you are finishing the word form in that grid. 
\ Rules: 1. In the first phase, play boggle on each of the small grids,i.e., form a word for each smaller grid consisting of 3 to 9 letters. 
\ 2. You will have 9 words with those letters for your second phase. In the second phase, by picking one letter from each quadrant, you can form words again. 
\ 3. You can revisit the grids but not select two letters in the same quadrant one after another. 
\ Scoring rules: Different points for different letters: 
\ 1. 1 point each for E, A, I, O, N, R, T, L, S, U 
\ 2. 2 points each for D, G 
\ 3. 3 points each for B, C, M, P 
\ 4. 4 points each for F, H, V, W, Y 
\ 5. 5 points for K 
\ 6. 8 points each for J, X 
\ 7. 10 points each for Q, Z 
\ The length of the words formed will also affect the points: 
\ word length: 3 - 5, points: the length of the word 
\ word length: 6, points: 10 
\ word length: 7, points: 15 
\ word length: 8, points: 20 
\ word length: 9, points: 25
